long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to help you with your stock charting efficiency. When you are online browsing the internet, it is much easier to have an extension like this so that you can quickly pull up a stock chart without the need to visit external websites. Open the extension and then input the ticker that you want to look at, press enter or submit and a popup will open of the ticker's chart! you can use this to help you evaluate companies on the fly without the need to exit out of your important news article you are reading. You can even just use it to sift through multiple stocks in order to see which chart you like the most to plan out your trading strategies in the future.
